item.title: Small Business Security Basics
item.description: Cyber Security is an important subject for businesses of all sizes. Sometimes small businesses struggle with the idea of implementing a cyber security plan because of costs. If done right, these costs can be minimal and more importantly, the cost of a security breach can be avoided. Here are a few tips to help your small business: Train your employees Make sure your employees understand the consequences of their behavior. Teach them to protect customer, business and private data.
